Unlike Limestone bricks, Marble blocks cannot be made by players. Item ID8786

Marble blocks are used in the Construction skill. They can only be bought in Keldagrim from the Stonemason for 325,000 coins. Unlike Limestone bricks, Marble blocks cannot be made by players. Marble blocks are commonly used to build high-level furniture and decorations in a player-owned house, yielding 500 experience per block used.

[[File:Marble block detail.png|left|190px]]
'''Marble blocks''' are used in the [[Construction]] skill. They can only be bought in [[Keldagrim]] from the [[Stonemason]] for 325,000 [[coins]]. Unlike [[Limestone brick]]s, Marble blocks cannot be made by players. Marble blocks are commonly used to build high-level furniture and decorations in a [[player-owned house]], yielding 500 experience per block used.
